Articles.Content:
Hi everybody!

I registered to the forums to release my own created plugin.

I joined the game about a year ago, i guess. It was version 0.19.1.

Started with the demo and shortly after i bought the full version.

I have landed on almost every body in the Kerbol system (only Ders, Ike and Eve are missing).

And of course i brought nearly all my Kerbals back.
Welcome, and Congrats on the successful missions. (Not sure how you missed landing on Ike or Eve since you've been to Gilly and Duna, but it's cool)

Thanks!

I meant landing manned and bring the Kerbals back to Kerbin.

But i have already sent a few probes to the surface of Eve.

And i haven't tried Ike yet, because i miss the challenge to land there.

But i will definitely go there to finish my research of the Kerbol system.
